description.ruby-sapphire:
Boosts strength sharply,
but lowers abilities.
description.emerald:
Boosts strength sharply,
but lowers abilities.
description.firered-leafgreen:
A powerful attack,
but it also lowers
the user’s ATTACK
and DEFENSE stats.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Attack and Defense by one stage each.
effect.shortEffect: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
